name: drupal-docker
description: Here are steps for running a Drupal development site by running separate Docker containers on Mac OS X.

scripts.mysql:tables: docker exec mysql mysql --user="drupal" --password="drupal" --database="drupal" --execute="use drupal; show tables;"
scripts.mysql:empty: docker exec mysql mysql --user="drupal" --password="drupal" --database="drupal" --execute="drop database drupal; create database drupal"
